_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.16^speaker: monks from the group of six
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:2.3^where_before_or_ar: Sāvatthī, Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's Monastery, a certain village in the Kosalan country
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:2.3^who_mentioned_befo: monks walking through the Kosalan country
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:2.3^who_present_before: monks from the group of six

another monk who went to get fire
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:4.7^who_mentioned_befo: a monk bitten by a snake
another monk who went to the village to get fire
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85^where: Sāvatthī, Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's Monastery, a certain village in the Kosalan country
